items.title: AI needs power desperately. Here’s how to invest in companies profiting from the pain.
items.description: The shortage is a lucrative opportunity — but the window is brief.

items.title: Our kids are grown. It’s time to cancel our Chase Disney Visa. What’s a good credit card for middle age?
items.description: “The card served its purpose while our kids were young.”

items.title: Market forecasts are usually wrong — but this inflation-fighting asset sees the future
items.description: ‘It’s tough to make predictions, especially about the future,’ Yogi Berra said. He could have been talking about Wall Street.

items.title: AI taking your job? That’s just what these CEOs want you to believe.
items.description: Companies spend billions on AI infrastructure they never fully use — then cut workers to cover up their mess.

items.title: With bitcoin down to around $92,000, should you rethink how much crypto to own? Here’s what experts say.
items.description: Financial institutions like BlackRock and Fidelity are now giving crypto recommendations too
